channel.title: CVE Feed for Changing Information Technology Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Changing Information Technology Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39055|2024-09-16T20:21:55.585Z -- changing%20information%20technology%20inc. -- rava%20certificate%20validation%20system
item.description: RAVA certificate validation system has inadequate filtering for URL parameter. An unauthenticated remote attacker can perform SSRF attack to discover internal network topology base on query response.

item.title: CVE-2022-39057|2024-09-16T20:22:40.826Z -- changing%20information%20technology%20inc. -- rava%20certificate%20validation%20system
item.description: RAVA certificate validation system has insufficient filtering for special parameter of the web page input field. A remote attacker with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary system command and disrupt service.
